# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. This product, valued at $1000000, offers unparalleled capabilities and efficiency. Considering its immense value, I kindly propose an initial offer of $950000. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
